author: ETA PRIME
description:
🚀 Intel’s Most Powerful iGPU Finally Tested! 🚀
In this video, we put the Intel Arc 140T GPU to the test — Intel’s next-gen integrated graphics powerhouse built for Arrow Lake H/HX CPUs. With 8 Xe cores, 8 ray tracing units, AV1 decoding, and XeSS upscaling support, this iGPU shows that Intel is serious about taking on the gaming laptop and mini PC market.
🎮 Why the Intel Arc 140T Matters:
Built on Intel’s latest Xe+ architecture for major performance gains.
Runs modern PC games at 1080p with medium to high settings.
Hardware-level ray tracing + AI-powered XeSS upscaling crush older iGPUs.
Paired with blazing-fast LPDDR5X 8400MHz RAM for smooth, responsive gameplay.
If you’ve been waiting to see how far Intel can push integrated graphics — this is it.
